body: Please upgrade dubbo version to 2.5.9 or 2.6.0, and use the latest dubbo-adimin

`JNI` is the tech your internal service uses, dubbo doesn't have a restriction on your implementation details. 
Anyway, you always need a `java shell` to communicate with other dubbo services and to use the service management features that dubbo highlights.

使用kryo序列化还跟spring有关系？
要怎样扫描，有文档吗？

I think this is the right link: http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/configuration/xml.html
I'll fix it later.
Have you checked that kryo is in your classpath?

@chickenlj 
Yes, I have added kryo-4.0.1 in pom.xml

In version [2.5.9](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/releases/tag/dubbo-2.5.9), we have add `dubbo.application.qos.enable` for users to open/close QOS.

In previous version, you can only specify the qos port and decide whether to receive traffics outside or not.

整明白了，除了 kryo 还需要添加 de.javakaffee:kryo-serializers 的依赖。
建议你们文档添加下说明，至少报错时提示下也行。
We are considering of support protobuf, and also [fastjson](https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson)

We plan integrate with OpenTracing recently.
As for Spring Cloud Sleuth, we will discuss the feasibility when integrating with Spring Cloud.
Can you provide a demo project? Some guys have reported this problem, but i can't reproduce in my environment.

Yes, you can achieve that by using `mock`. But currently we don't have a documentation introducing this feature, you can refer the [source code](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-cluster/src/test/java/com/alibaba/dubbo/rpc/cluster/router/MockInvoker.java) for details of how to configure.

Which serialization framework do you use?
Highly recommend you check the DTO versions on both consumer and provider, there may be some compatibility problems when you use different versions of Class.
We will take it, thanks for you advice.
What dubbo version do you use? The previous version may block the remote call when registry can not be reached, we recommend you upgrade to the latest dubbo version.
Can 8.5.x works on JDK 1.7 or lower?
Thanks, i will review the PR laterly.

Looks good to me.
我们使用scala + dubbo 一年了。 dubbo的hession2对Scala数据类型非常不好，发布吃了不少苦头，差点整个Facade都打算退回到Java了，核心Service只用Scala。后来研究发现了Kryo+Chill能比较完美的解决这个问题，推荐你试试。
我在kryo基础上还加入了twitter chill，支持Java的同时，还能比较完美的支持Scala，让Scala童鞋也能享受dubbo直接支持数据类型的快感，如何分享呢？
@chickenlj can you review this [PR](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/pull/1267)
It's not a question, Clients can choose which version that they want, Dubbo did not depend on Tomcat API
thanks for the reply
如果考虑其他因素不方便放开的话, 那只能通过 ```BeanPostProcessor```来实现自定义扫描、注入. 这对我们来说比较麻烦且有风险,还是希望能使用dubbo官方的支持

Cannot resolve reference to bean 'esClient' while setting constructor argument; nested exception is org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanCreationException: Error creating bean with name 'esClient': Invocation of init method failed; nested exception is java.lang.IllegalStateException: availableProcessors is already set to [4], rejecting [4]

还跟es的netty有冲突。。。

It is the maven-javadoc-plugin's bad, which contains lower version of commons-lang dependency that is not compatible with Java 9. Updating version to 3.0.0 will solve this issue. I will send out PR later.

`DUBBO_IP_TO_REGISTRY`  and `DUBBO_PORT_TO_REGISTRY` don't affect the ip and port your provider bind to.  If you only specify ip and port for registry and use different ip and port for binding, your network should have a mechanism to map registry ip/port with bind ip/port automatically. Like `Port Mapping` docker provides.

> Why dubbo protocol-implementation version changed to 2.0.1?

Sorry this change has bothered you, actually we haven't changed the dubbo RPC protocol at all, so don't worry to use the new version. This change only benefits those who use RMI protocol.
Currently, dubbo framework uses the `version` key to pass version information between consumers and providers, but actually there's no code uses this feature before 2.5.9. Lately, we want to use this feature to identify peers use different versions, so we can do upgrade the RPC protocol smoothly.
We all know spring @Resource needs a bean for injection. But is this has sth to do with dubbo.

dubbo.application.qos.port=33333
dubbo.application.qos.enable=true/false

In 2.5.9, please use the demo configuration above, i will update the docs later.

Currently, we don't support XML configuration.
You can use `dubbo.properties` instead:
`dubbo.application.qos.port=22222`

2.6.0 （base on master） is a new feature version (merge dubbox's core feature)
 2.5.9（base on 2.5.x）  is a bug fix version （without dubbox's core feature，but fix some bugs）

the two releases are both not the newest code，now the master branch have  newest code

@chickenlj 

Would love to see how you guys adapted with open tracing, we just worked out a solution that works, yet not elegantly.

The major challenge is how to pass the trace data between different threads, e.g. the i/o worker which handles decode, the dubbo thread which handles execution and encode, etc. 

As we need to present the whole process of decoding request, execution, encoding response in one message tree for the service side, and the whole process of encoding request, sending to server, decoding response for the client side. Which means we have to gather the data from different threads and merge them together.

We would appreciate it if you guys could share this part of code ASAP!

On 12/8/2017 14:21，Ian Luo<notifications@github.com> wrote：
Who is Using Dubbo

First of all, thanks sincerely for constantly using and supporting dubbo. We will try our best to keep dubbo better, and keep growing community and eco-system.

The purpose of this issue
We’d like to listen to the community to make dubbo better.
We want to attract more people to contribute to dubbo.
We're willing to learn more dubbo use scenarios in the field for better planning.
What we expect from you

Pls. submit a comment in this issue to include the following infomation:

your company, school or organization.
your city and country.
your contact info: blog, email, twitter (at least one).
for what business scenario do you use dubbo

You can refer to the following sample answer for the format:

* Orgnizatioin: Alibaba
* Location: Hangzhou, China
* Contact: ian.luo@gmail.com
* Purpose: used as cornerstone in distributed service architecture alibaba switched years ago.


Thanks again for your participation !
Dubbo Team

谁在使用 Dubbo

首先诚挚地感谢每一位持续关注并使用 Dubbo 的朋友。我们会持续投入，力图把 dubbo 变得更好，把 dubbo 社区和生态变得更加繁荣。

此 Issue 的目的
聆听社区的声音，让 dubbo 变得更好
吸引更多的人参与贡献
更多的了解 dubbo 的实际使用场景，以方便下一步的规划
我们期待您能提供

在此提交一条评论, 评论内容包括:

您所在公司、学校或组织
您所在的城市、国家
您的联系方式: 微博、邮箱、微信 (至少一个)
您将 dubbo 用于哪些业务场景

您可以参考下面的样例来提供您的信息：

* 组织：阿里巴巴
* 地点：中国杭州
